bibl.title: A Stele of a "Follower of Isis" in the Egyptian Museum of Turin.
Coptic Studies. Acts of the Third International Congress of Coptic Studies. Warsaw, 20-25 August, 1984
bibl.author: D'AMICONE, Elvira

bibl.note: Inv. 18110. Limestone, H. 45 cm. Antinoe (?), 3rd-4th c. High-relief: child wearing a tunic, and grasping a dove in one hand, and a cluster of grapes in the other.
bibl.seg: D'AMICONE Elvira, A Stele of a "Follower of Isis" in the Egyptian Museum of Turin.
Coptic Studies. Acts of the Third International Congress of Coptic Studies. Warsaw, 20-25 August, 1984 (Varsovie, 1990) pp. 83-86, 1 fig.
